title: My Reaction to a person who said that they main Vayne, Riven and Lux Support.

replies.body:
it actually makes a bit of sense that vayne might be a support with her disengage

the same might happen with sivir given that she has free poke if they are anywhere near the minions and a spell shield if the player's reflexes are good enough

I hated blitzcrank so much as sivir XD

Not Riven and Vayne Support. Lux Support. He just mains the other 2 aswell in their respective roles.

Also, Vayne Support is useless. Don't even try it. I have, it's utter trash with a 17 Second E and that's all you're good for since you have no damage to match the enemies.

> [{quoted}](name=LightTrack,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Ye0tGO0Q,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-02-18T17:09:10.047+0000)
>
> Not Riven and Vayne Support. Lux Support. He just mains the other 2 aswell in their respective roles.
> 
> Also, Vayne Support is useless. Don't even try it. I have, it's utter trash with a 17 Second E and that's all you're good for since you have no damage to match the enemies.

What Riven and Vayne main would play Lux? 0_o

> [{quoted}](name=LightTrack,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Ye0tGO0Q,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2017-02-19T20:12:45.906+0000)
>
> Why wouldn't they?

She's not super mechanically intensive.

Then again not many supps are.

It's more about the bad habits of players who play those champions rather than preference. For example, i can play almost every role and champion in the game, i'll still stick to what i like. But it doesn't mean i won't ever try new champions.
